alert.note: Alert for Orange; Richmond (Staten Is.); Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 8:41PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hudson, eastern Passaic, Union, western Bergen, Essex, south central Orange, Richmond and Rockland Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 840 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Morristown to Todt Hill. Movement was north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Paterson, Elizabeth, Passaic, Bayonne, Wayne, Plainfield, Bloomfield, Linden, Orange, Ridgewood, Summit, Lyndhurst, Millburn and Rutherford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
